T02D2962:44b-0: @44b * // dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2962:44b-1: 'dod pa'i don nges par bsgrub par 'dod pas sgrub
T02D2962:44b-2: pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas gnas khang yid
T02D2962:44b-3: dang mthun par mandal ser po yid du 'ong ba'i
T02D2962:44b-4: steng du me tog ser po dri ma med pa
T02D2962:44b-5: bkram ste / bdag nyid kyis sngon du ci rigs pa'i bya ba'i rim pa rdzogs par byas la /
T02D2962:44b-6: bum pa'i nang du su ser po las byung ba'i lha mo rgyan sna tshogs par brgyan par blta'o //
T02D2962:44b-7: h'um las byung ba'i khro bo gtum po mdog ser
T02D2962:44b-8: po klu'i bu rnams kyis brgyan pa rnam par bsgom
T02D2962:44b-9: par bya'o // de la ye shes sems dpa' spyan
T02D2962:44b-10: drangs te mchod pa dang bstod pa dang gsol ba
T02D2962:44b-12: de nas bdag nyid rdo rje gtum po'i nga rgyal
T02D2962:44b-13: dang ldan pas bdag gam gzhan bsgrub bya'i lus thams
T02D2962:44b-14: cad rdo rje rtse gsum par byin gyis brlabs te
T02D2962:44b-15: / pha rol gyi lus la gnod par rung ba
T02D2962:44b-16: gang yin pa rnams bcing ba dang bkar ba dang
T02D2962:44b-17: / / spa bkong ba'i las nye bar bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D2962:44b-18: yul 'joms pa'i rdo rje spyi bor rnam par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2962:44b-19: de nas de'i rjes la dngos dang dngos ma yin pa'i tshogs bsag pa'i rten spyan drangs te /
T02D2962:44b-20: tshogs ji ltar 'byor pa bsag par byas la bdag
T02D2962:44b-21: nyid kyis rdo rje rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i
T02D2962:44b-23: dbang dang rgyas pa'i gzugs kyis langs la h'um h'um
T02D2962:44b-24: zhes rab tu khros pa'i sems kyis sdang bar bltas
T02D2962:44b-25: la / hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gad mos bcu
T02D2962:44b-26: gnyis sam dgu'am bdun bgad pas las thams cad 'grub
T02D2962:44b-27: par 'gyur ba la the tshom med do //
T02D2962:44b-28: de yang skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i tshe khro bo gtum po'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas /
T02D2962:44b-29: aom ma ta badzra badzra h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a zhes stong phrag gnyis bzlas te /
T02D2962:44b-30: bdag nyid kyi lus la mi 'jig cing sra ba'i
T02D2962:44b-31: gos gyon la rdo rje'i lus kyi rnam par 'dug
T02D2962:44b-32: pa la lan bdun nam bcu gcig byas na lus
T02D2962:45a-1: kyi chu rgyun gyis bkrus na longs spyod rnams kyi
T02D2962:45a-2: dbang po brgya byin dang mnyam zhing tshe nyi zla
T02D2962:45a-3: ji ltar yod pa bzhin du gnas pa dang /
T02D2962:45a-4: sa bla'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la dbang ba dang /
T02D2962:45a-6: bsgrags pa dang nges par spyod par 'grub pa dang /
T02D2962:45a-10: mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang /
T02D2962:45a-11: 'dab chags rnams kyi stobs kyi rgyal po dang /
T02D2962:45a-13: dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi chogs rnams kyi rje bo dang /
T02D2962:45a-14: blta zhing bsnyen bkur chen por 'gyur ro //
T02D2962:45a-15: de nas de'i las rnams bsgrub pa la brtson pa'i
T02D2962:45a-16: sgrub pa po rnams kyis nges par sra ba'i don
T02D2962:45a-17: bsgrub pa ni rgyud kyi tshig nges par bsgrub pa'o
T02D2962:45a-18: // 'dod pa'i don dus la nges par bsgrub pa /
